title: My league client keeps tabbing out
body:
happens pretty much once every game
Never had this issue until a month ago
ALso not sure if it's related but I have this thing every time I get into a game
https://imgur.com/zTcCGDL 
It used to happen occasionally but never caused any trouble so I didn't care about it, but it's happening every game now and looks suspicious.

replies.body: Are you getting into a game at all?  It sounds like your client is going into a dormant state after champion select, so it fails to get you over to the game server.  If I'm understanding correctly, then you'll want to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case there is a block or instability preventing you from getting in-game.  Let me know if this helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4WWclyVF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-20T15:32:39.150+0000)
>
> Are you getting into a game at all?  It sounds like your client is going into a dormant state after champion select, so it fails to get you over to the game server.  If I'm understanding correctly, then you'll want to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case there is a block or instability preventing you from getting in-game.  Let me know if this helps!

No I can get into the game, there's just an extra window leaving behind. 
And sometimes it randomly switches to other windows or desktop in the middle of a game as if I pressed alt+tab (which I didn'tï¼‰.

Thanks for the clarification!  It sounds like something is trying to take focus away from League.  What happens if you enable [Close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png)?  

Try running League as Administrator as well in case a setting might be causing this.  See what other programs you have running in the background, I'm betting a third party could be doing it.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4WWclyVF,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-20T16:22:52.412+0000)
>
> Thanks for the clarification!  It sounds like something is trying to take focus away from League.  What happens if you enable [Close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png)?  
> 
> Try running League as Administrator as well in case a setting might be causing this.  See what other programs you have running in the background, I'm betting a third party could be doing it.

close client during game seem to do the trick.
Thanks for the help
